title: Global PET and Aridity
description:
Raster climate data related to evapotranspiration processes and rainfall deficit for potential vegetative growth

Geographic extent: Global
Year range: 1950-2000
Resolution: 30 arcsec (~1 km)
Data layers: Potential Evapo-Transpiration (PET), Aridity
attribution: Zomer RJ, Trabucco A, Bossio DA, van Straaten O, Verchot LV, 2008. Climate Change Mitigation: A Spatial Analysis of Global Land Suitability for Clean Development Mechanism Afforestation and Reforestation. Agric. Ecosystems and Envir. 126: 67-80.

Zomer RJ, Bossio DA, Trabucco A, Yuanjie L, Gupta DC & Singh VP, 2007. Trees and Water: Smallholder Agroforestry on Irrigated Lands in Northern India. Colombo, Sri Lanka: International Water Management Institute. pp 45. (IWMI Research Report 122).
